Title: Relates to the availability of air transport ambulance service providers to store and distribute blood
Summary: Authorizes air transport ambulance service providers to store and distribute human blood at all their facilities and distribute human blood while providing air transport services.
LawCode: Add ยง3003-e, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to availability of air transport ambulance service providers to store and distribute blood
